items.value: We can be friends if you give me the Special Delivery!

Hey Mate,
did you got the Special Delivery Box from Bob?

I can't wait to finally open it, there are important fertilizers in it!
I will give you a Present for your help...
Uh.. Fertilizers? What do you do with it?
Yes, i got the Special Delivery Box for you!

You're really curious!
But because you're Bob's best friend, I'll tell you.
I'm in the green business, do you understand?

I grow beautiful flowers that bring me some money.
Visit the grow shop if you want to do something like that!

Thank you so much,
from now on you can call me your friend.
I will help you during your difficult time on the street.

Visit me if you need a task!
Of course I will pay you for your services.

You got: 1x A Countryside Gentleman (Vol.1), 1x Mattock

you dont have the Special Delivery of Bob!
please come back as soon you got it...
Mkay, i will visit Bob for you!
